divs: sighting detailsships are flying repeatedly overhead. i am using binoculars and can barely make out the ship configurations; i see at least two types of ships. one like the battleship described in the video, this one was travelling very fast; estimate it to be going 4000mph at extreme altitude. the other ships travel at a somewhat lower altitude and going about 1000 mph. all have red\green and white lights that blink; thought i saw the color blue as well on another ship at my extreme west horizon. a helicopter passed over my neighborhood with a vector heading south. sorry no photos. i need a telescope with camera otherwise it will be a bogus image.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pflugerville
There were no other sightings in Pflugerville on or around February 7th 2008
